item.title: How to live your digital life in a terminal : Introduction
item.author: Author
item.description: The bloated web I recall a few years ago me sharing Mozillaâ€™s dream for the web. The web was on its way to become the main platform for internet users. And that was supposed to be a good thing, due to its openness and the freedom that it was providing. But freedom and control are relative concepts. Web now has become bloated with unnecessary code, advertisements, pop-ups, comments and recommendation systems that are trying to mine our data and keep us hooked in their user interfaces by providing us with constants hits of dopamine.
